SiloGrid.card1_sub: From "Zero to Hero". Basic survival, hydration management, and PVE economy.
SiloGrid.card2_sub: Ground Zero, Warehouse, and Farm Town maps with hidden extracts.
SiloGrid.card3_sub: Where to find blueprints for Tier 3 weapons and Hideout upgrades.

QuickIntel.tip_content: The "Scrap" Economy: Unlike other shooters, don't ignore junk items. Use the Workbench in your Bunker to dismantle scrap into raw materials. This is the only way to craft high-tier ammo and upgrades without spending cash.
meta_list: Aim Assist Module: Best for clearing "Ground Zero" quickly.
Mosin Bipod: Essential for boss fights (Big Boy).
Explosive Rounds: High splash damage against groups of ducks.

LatestOps.card3: Roguelite Mechanics: How Death Affects Progression

FAQ.title: Field Manual Q&A
FAQ.q1: Is Escape From Duckov multiplayer or PVP?
FAQ.a1: No. Escape From Duckov is strictly a single-player PVE extraction shooter. You fight against AI enemies (Hostile Ducks), not real players. While unofficial co-op mods exist on the Steam Workshop, the core game is designed for solo progression.
FAQ.q2: Does the game have native controller support?
FAQ.a2: Not officially. As of Patch v1.3.12, Escape From Duckov does not have native controller support. However, it is rated "Playable" on Steam Deck by using community layouts (Steam Input) to map WASD controls to joysticks.
FAQ.q3: Where is the save file location?
FAQ.a3: Your save data is located at: %AppData%\LocalLow\TeamSoda\Duckov\Saves. Tip: The game has a built-in "Restore Backup" feature in the main menu if your save gets corrupted.
FAQ.a4: You will lose all loot in your backpack and equipped gear. However, your Hideout upgrades, unlocked Blueprints, and Skill Tree progression are permanent. This "Roguelite" twist allows you to become stronger even after failed extractions.
FAQ.q5: How do I fix the "Pink Texture" glitch?
FAQ.a5: This is a known issue with older GPU drivers. Please update your drivers or verify the integrity of game files via Steam. If the issue persists, try disabling "Rim Light" in the graphics settings.

MissionBriefing.p1: // TARGET DESIGNATION: ESCAPE FROM DUCKOV This database is dedicated to Escape From Duckov, the top-down PVE extraction shooter developed by Team Soda. Unlike traditional FPS titles, this indie gem combines tactical survival mechanics with Roguelite progression. Players assume the role of an Average Duck, tasked with scavenging dynamic maps like Ground Zero, The Slums, and Chemical Plant. The operational loop involves managing hydration, sanity, and inventory space while evading hostile AI ducks to secure a safe extraction.
MissionBriefing.p2: // TACTICAL_ASSETS & UTILITY DuckovWiki is the premier Unofficial Field Manual designed to reduce the learning curve. Our archive includes: 1. Interactive Maps: Pinpointing all hidden Stashes, Blueprints, and Extraction Points. 2. Armory Data: Detailed stats for 50+ weapons, including Ammo Damage Charts and Recoil Control builds. 3. Hideout Planner: A complete calculator for Workbench upgrades, tracking required materials like Scrap Metal, Circuit Boards, and Duct Tape. 4. Quest Log: Step-by-step walkthroughs for NPC missions from Jeff the Duck, including key locations and item requirements.
MissionBriefing.p3: // OPERATIONAL_STATUS Whether you are optimizing your Steam Deck layout or looking for the best Solo Farming Routes, this site is updated daily. All intel is verified for Steam Early Access (Patch v1.3.12). We strictly support legitimate single-player progression and do not condone cheats.

About.title: About Us
About.intro: DuckovWiki is the premier unofficial field manual for "Escape From Duckov", the top-down PVE extraction shooter developed by Team Soda. Unlike standard shooters, this project documents the unique fusion of tactical survival and Roguelite progression. We exist to aid the "Average Duck" in navigating hostile zones like The Slums and Chemical Plant, providing verified intel on hydration management, sanity control, and safe extraction points.
About.value1_desc: From hidden Stashes to Blueprints, every data point is verified for Patch v1.3.12. If it is in the database, it exists in the field.
About.value2_desc: We strictly support legitimate single-player progression and provide the data needed to master the loop.
About.status_desc: Designated as a comprehensive tactical archive, DuckovWiki reduces the learning curve for new operators. Our interactive archives cover everything from Weapon Recoil Charts and Ammo Damage to detailed Quest Logs for NPCs like Jeff the Duck. Whether you are optimizing your Steam Deck layout or calculating resource costs for Workbench upgrades (Scrap Metal, Duct Tape), our data is updated daily to reflect the latest Steam game version. We are an independent fan site supporting the game's ecosystem.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.desc: We value your feedback and are dedicated to providing the best experience for the community. Whether you've found a data error, have a feature suggestion, or just want to say hello, we are ready to listen. Please note that we are a fan site and cannot assist with game account issues (bans, refunds, etc.). For such issues, please contact Team Soda directly.
Contact.card_desc: For all support requests, business inquiries, and DMCA copyright reports, please contact us directly via email. We aim to respond to all legitimate inquiries within 48 hours.

Disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
Disclaimer.p1: DuckovWiki is strictly an unofficial, fan-made database. We are NOT Team Soda. We are a community project dedicated to documenting "Escape From Duckov". All official inquiries regarding the game should be directed to the official developer channels.
Disclaimer.p2: This website is not endorsed by, directly affiliated with, maintained, authorized, or sponsored by Team Soda. All product and company names are the registered trademarks of their original owners. The use of any trade name or trademark is for identification and reference purposes only and does not imply any association with the trademark holder of their product brand.
Disclaimer.p3: All images, sounds, and assets from "Escape From Duckov" are the property of Team Soda. They are used here under Fair Use principles for educational and informational purposes only. If you are the copyright holder and wish for assets to be removed, please contact us.
Disclaimer.p4: DuckovWiki is a wiki project. Content is open to editing and may contain errors, outdated information (from previous patches), or subjective opinions. Do not rely on this data for critical in-game decisions without cross-referencing.
Disclaimer.p5: This website contains links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by or in any way affiliated with DuckovWiki. Please note that the DuckovWiki does not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites.
Disclaimer.p6: Parts of this website may allow users to post or comment. We are not responsible for the content or accuracy of any user-generated material.
Disclaimer.p7: Following guides and strategies on this site is done at your own risk. We are not responsible for any loss of in-game gear, currency, or progress that may occur while attempting to replicate strategies described here.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.p1: DuckovWiki ("us", "we", or "our") operates the https://duckovwiki.fun website (the "Service"). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
Privacy.p2: We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.
Privacy.p3_essential: Essential Data: We may collect data necessary for the operation of the site, such as your IP address and browser type (Log Data).
Privacy.p3_analytics: Analytics: We use generic analytics tools to understand site traffic. This data is anonymized.
Privacy.p4: DuckovWiki uses the collected data for various purposes: To provide and maintain the Service; To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so; To provide customer care and support; To provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the Service; To monitor the usage of the Service; To detect, prevent and address technical issues.
Privacy.h5: 5. Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data Under GDPR
Privacy.p5: If you are from the European Economic Area (EEA), DuckovWiki's legal basis for collecting and using the personal information described in this Privacy Policy depends on the Personal Data we collect and the specific context in which we collect it. We may process your Personal Data because: We need to perform a contract with you; You have given us permission to do so; The processing is in our legitimate interests and it's not overridden by your rights; To comply with the law.
Privacy.p6: DuckovWiki will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
Privacy.p7: Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction. If you are located outside United States and choose to provide information to us, please note that we transfer the data, including Personal Data, to United States and process it there.
Privacy.p8: DuckovWiki may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to: To comply with a legal obligation; To protect and defend the rights or property of DuckovWiki; To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service; To protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public; To protect against legal liability.
Privacy.p9: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
Privacy.h10: 10. Your Data Protection Rights Under GDPR
Privacy.p10: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights. DuckovWiki aims to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your Personal Data. If you wish to be informed what Personal Data we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please contact us.
Privacy.p11: We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service ("Service Providers"), to provide the Service on our behalf, to perform Service-related services or to assist us in analyzing how our Service is used. These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
Privacy.p12: Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.
Privacy.p13: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 ("Children"). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.
Privacy.contact_desc: For privacy questions, please contact contact@duckovwiki.fun.
